items.body_markdown:
I'm just getting started with GitHub and I'm trying to follow these instructions: https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git

I've downloaded GitBash but when I click on it, the window pops up for a split second and then disappears again. I've tried not using the shortcut, and uninstall/reinstall, but neither helped, and I don't know enough about it to do any additional troubleshooting.

Even if you don't have a solution, some google search terms would be great - I don't know if there's a specific name for this kind of a problem. 

Thank you!
items.title: Gitbash closes immediately, can't sign in to Github
items.body:
I'm just getting started with GitHub and I'm trying to follow these instructions: https://help.github.com/articles/set-up-git

I've downloaded GitBash but when I click on it, the window pops up for a split second and then disappears again. I've tried not using the shortcut, and uninstall/reinstall, but neither helped, and I don't know enough about it to do any additional troubleshooting.

Even if you don't have a solution, some google search terms would be great - I don't know if there's a specific name for this kind of a problem.

Thank you!

items.title: Is reading from datatable not thread safe in Parallel Foreach
items.body:
My requirement is to get all the distinct customers and foreach customer get the related products and foreach product get its related data for ex:productspec, productcategory etc etc and save the data to xml file for each individual customer. Currently I have implemented it sequentially using regular foreach(takes 12 hours to complete), but to improve performance I trying to do a parallel foreach on the customer but it is not producing the right results.Here is the sample code, which part of the code is not thread safe and is there any alternative to improve performance?

List<DataRow> list = ds.AsEnumerable().ToList();
            Parallel.ForEach(list, dr =>
            {
                OleDbConnection olc = new OleDbConnection(DBCONN);
                string cmdtext = Dts.Variables["CUSTOMER"].Value.ToString();
                string clause = " Where Customer='" + dr["CUST"] + "'";
                cmdtext = string.Concat(cmdtext, clause);
                DataTable asset_dt = new DataTable(); 
                /* This part gets the product related data
                DataTable spec_dt = new DataTable();
                DataTable spec1_dt = new DataTable();
                DataTable spec2_dt = new DataTable();
                DataTable spec3_dt = new DataTable();
                DataTable spec4_dt = new DataTable();
                DataTable spec5_dt = new DataTable();
                DataTable spec6_dt = new DataTable();
                DataTable spec7_dt = new DataTable();
                DataTable spec8_dt = new DataTable();
                */
                OleDbDataAdapter dp = new OleDbDataAdapter(cmdtext, olc); //For now I am only filling the product data for simplicity
                dp.Fill(asset_dt);
                XmlDocument xmldoc = new XmlDocument();
                ExportToXmlSubnodes(asset_dt, spec_dt, spec1_dt, spec2_dt, spec3_dt, spec4_dt, spec5_dt, spec6_dt, spec7_dt, spec8_dt, xmldoc);
            });

If I have 10 customers then parallel foreach is not producing all the 10 files, each time it produces different numbers, whereas the regular foreach produces all 10.

items.body_markdown:
select
	SUM(LAANTA) AS "ANTAL",
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180101 AND 20180131 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS JAN,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180201 AND 20180231 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS FEB,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180301 AND 20180331 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS MAR,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180401 AND 20180431 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS APR,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180501 AND 20180531 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS MAJ,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180601 AND 20180631 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS JUN,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180701 AND 20180731 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS JUL,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180801 AND 20180831 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS AUG,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20180901 AND 20180931 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS SEP,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20181001 AND 20181031 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS OKT,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20181101 AND 20181131 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS NOV,
    sum(CASE WHEN LADATU BETWEEN 20181201 AND 20181231 THEN LAANTA ELSE 0 END ) AS DEC



	FROM TRUFPR424/TRLLA00
	
		 left join trafi00
	 	on trlla00.laart = trafi00.fiart 
	left join mslev	
		on trafi00.filev1 =mslev.lvlev 
		
		
		where laskod = 'F'  and lafili = 10 and laart = '006003259'


**Explanation**


Number of items sold each month for one year, per article these items should be sorted against the supplier as the article has.

LAART = Article

LADATU = date

LAANTA = number sold

LVLEV = Supplier Number

LAART: This is the article number that will be merged every month.

LADATU = This is the date range for which the item has been sold.

LAANTA = this is the number of times per occasion, these should be merged with the item at the time of sale.

LVLEV = This is the supplier's number, I want to know how many items belonging to the supplier sold during each month.


    

	 	select distinct
	LAFILI AS "FILIAL", 
	LAART AS "ARTIKEL", 
	LADATU AS "DATUM", 
	LASKOD AS "FÖRSÄLJNINGSKOD", 
	LAANTA AS "ANTALSÅLDA", 
	trafi00.fiben1 AS "ARTIKEL BENÄMNING", 
	lvnamn AS "LEV.NAMN",
	lvlev

	
	
	FROM TRUFPR424/TRLLA00 

	 left join trafi00
	 	on trlla00.laart = trafi00.fiart 
	left join mslev	
		on trafi00.filev1 =mslev.lvlev 

	
	 	where laskod = 'F' and lafili = 10 and LADATU between 20180101 and 20180130 and laart = '006003259'
	 	order by 3, 7

**How can I do this**

Please ask me if you need more information about what I am trying to execute.

I have showed two codes that I´m trying to use for achive this, but I´m really new to SQL.

The database engine is DB2. I whant it to look like something like this:

    1 | LVLEV    | FIBEN1 | LAART    | Jan | Feb | Mar | Apr | May | June |...
    2 | 235670   | sprite | 12345143 | 200 | 400 | 200 | 450 | 500 | 600  | ....
    3 | 235670   | Fanta  | 54673456 | 100 | 500 | 100 | 50  | 60  |  0   | ....
    
I I whant to change the supplier number manually. and get item the sold for each month based on the supplier.

LAFILI AS "FILIAL",

items.body_markdown:
I have looked at both https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16824004/django-conditional-login-redirect and https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3842075/conditional-login-redirect-in-django and neither address my current issue.

What I want to do is check a property of the user after they have successfully logged in. If the property is in a good state send them directly to the page specified by the `next` URL argument, otherwise send them to fix the property and then forward them to the `next` page.

So far I have succeeded in sending the user on to `next` after they have fixed the property, but I can't conditionally redirect after login.

I know I can set the `LOGIN_REDIRECT_URL`, but that only applies if there is no value in `next`.
items.title: Conditionaly redirect users after login
items.body:
I have looked at both Django -- Conditional Login Redirect and Conditional login redirect in Django and neither address my current issue.

What I want to do is check a property of the user after they have successfully logged in. If the property is in a good state send them directly to the page specified by the next URL argument, otherwise send them to fix the property and then forward them to the next page.

So far I have succeeded in sending the user on to next after they have fixed the property, but I can't conditionally redirect after login.

I know I can set the LOGIN_REDIRECT_URL, but that only applies if there is no value in next.

items.body_markdown:
I am trying to change the headers of a CSV file, however I am only able to change the rows of data, and not the headers.

I tried looking at other examples, however they did not work. I have been looking at some of the [Ruby documentation][1], however it is still not working.

Here is how I am trying to do it right now:
    
    input = File.open TestFile, 'r' #read
    output = File.open TestFile, 'w' #write
    CSV.filter input, output, :headers => true, :write_headers => true, :return_headers => true do |csv|
      csv << ["Test"] if row.header_row?
    end


  [1]: http://ruby-doc.org/stdlib-2.0.0/libdoc/csv/rdoc/CSV.html
items.title: How to change headers of a CSV file using Ruby
items.body:
I am trying to change the headers of a CSV file, however I am only able to change the rows of data, and not the headers.

I tried looking at other examples, however they did not work. I have been looking at some of the Ruby documentation, however it is still not working.

Here is how I am trying to do it right now:

input = File.open TestFile, 'r' #read
output = File.open TestFile, 'w' #write
CSV.filter input, output, :headers => true, :write_headers => true, :return_headers => true do |csv|
  csv << ["Test"] if row.header_row?
end

items.body_markdown:
I have a `Seq` of Spark dataframes (i.e. `Seq[org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame]`), it could contain 1 or many elements.
There is a list of columns that is common to each of those dataframes, each dataframe also has some additional columns. What I would like to do is join together all those dataframes using those common columns in the join conditions (remember, the number of dataframes is unknown)

How can I join together all these dataframes? I guess I could `foreach` over them but that doesn't seem very elegant. Can anyone come up with a more functional way of doing it? *edit: A recursive function would be better than a foreach, I'm working on that now, will post it up here when done*.

Here is some code that creates a list of n dataframes (n=3 in this case), each of which contains columns `id` & `Product`:

    import org.apache.spark.SparkConf
    import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession
    import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
    val conf = new SparkConf().setMaster("local[*]")
    val spark = SparkSession.builder().appName("Feature Generator tests").config(conf).config("spark.sql.warehouse.dir", "/tmp/hive").enableHiveSupport().getOrCreate()
    val df = spark.range(0, 1000).toDF().withColumn("Product", concat(lit("product"), col("id")))
    val dataFrames = Seq(1,2,3).map(s => df.withColumn("_" + s.toString, lit(s)))

*To clarify, `dataFrames.head.columns` returns `Array[String] = Array(id, Product, _1)`.*

How might I join those n dataframes together on columns `id` & `Product` so that the returned dataframe has columns `Array[String] = Array(id, Product, _1, _2, _3)`?
items.title: How can I join a list of Spark dataframes together in Scala?
items.body:
I have a Seq of Spark dataframes (i.e. Seq[org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame]), it could contain 1 or many elements. There is a list of columns that is common to each of those dataframes, each dataframe also has some additional columns. What I would like to do is join together all those dataframes using those common columns in the join conditions (remember, the number of dataframes is unknown)

How can I join together all these dataframes? I guess I could foreach over them but that doesn't seem very elegant. Can anyone come up with a more functional way of doing it? edit: A recursive function would be better than a foreach, I'm working on that now, will post it up here when done.

Here is some code that creates a list of n dataframes (n=3 in this case), each of which contains columns id & Product:

import org.apache.spark.SparkConf
import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
val conf = new SparkConf().setMaster("local[*]")
val spark = SparkSession.builder().appName("Feature Generator tests").config(conf).config("spark.sql.warehouse.dir", "/tmp/hive").enableHiveSupport().getOrCreate()
val df = spark.range(0, 1000).toDF().withColumn("Product", concat(lit("product"), col("id")))
val dataFrames = Seq(1,2,3).map(s => df.withColumn("_" + s.toString, lit(s)))

To clarify, dataFrames.head.columns returns Array[String] = Array(id, Product, _1).

How might I join those n dataframes together on columns id & Product so that the returned dataframe has columns Array[String] = Array(id, Product, _1, _2, _3)?

items.body_markdown:
I want to print file details along with grep output but unable to do so.  E.g., for the command

    grep 3456 A.txt

I get the output 

    A.txt

but would like the output

    -rw-rw-r-- 1 tarun tarun   41356911 Aug 25 01:31 A.txt

I tried the following without success:

1. `grep 34567 A.txt | xargs ls -tlr`

1. `grep 34567 A.txt | while read line ; do echo "$line" | date %s.%N ; done`

1. `grep -Hr 34567 A.txt | awk -F: '{"stat -c %z "$1 | getline r; print r": "$0 }'`

1. `grep 34567 A.txt | awk -F: '{"date -r \""$1"\" +\"%F %R\"" | getline d; print d,$0}'`
items.title: How to print file details of files matching grep pattern
items.body:
I want to print file details along with grep output but unable to do so. E.g., for the command

grep 3456 A.txt

I get the output 

A.txt

but would like the output

-rw-rw-r-- 1 tarun tarun   41356911 Aug 25 01:31 A.txt

I tried the following without success:

  1. grep 34567 A.txt | xargs ls -tlr

  2. grep 34567 A.txt | while read line ; do echo "$line" | date %s.%N ; done

  3. grep -Hr 34567 A.txt | awk -F: '{"stat -c %z "$1 | getline r; print r": "$0 }'

  4. grep 34567 A.txt | awk -F: '{"date -r \""$1"\" +\"%F %R\"" | getline d; print d,$0}'

items.title: How to store GPS data from the arduino to a remote server using the ESP32 NodeMCU
items.body: I'm currently working on a project for my senior design class this involves storing the longitude and latitude coordinates retrieved from a GPS module through an Arduino into a server. I am able to get the coordinates successfully and I've already established a link between the ESP32 and a firebase database, however I have no clue now transfer this data from the Arduino to the ESP32 and was wondering if anyone could guide or point me towards the right direction on how to do this? Would this even be possible? If not, what would be any good alternatives on approaching this situation? I'm very new at this and any help would be greatly appreciated.

items.title: invalid JPEG format: missing SOI marker
items.body:
Trying to decode an image and write to a file.

This is my code:

package main

import (
        "bytes"
        "fmt"
        "github.com/reteps/gopowerschool"
        "image/jpeg"
)

func main() {
        client := gopowerschool.Client("https://example.com")
        session, userID, err := client.CreateUserSessionAndStudent("username", "password")
        if err != nil {
                panic(err)
        }   
        response, err := client.GetStudentPhoto(&gopowerschool.GetStudentPhoto{UserSessionVO: session, StudentID: userID})
        if err != nil {
                panic(err)
        }   
        fmt.Println(string(response.Return_))
        image, err := jpeg.Decode(bytes.NewReader(response.Return_))
        if err != nil {
                panic(err)
        }   
        fmt.Println(image)

}

The image is:

/9j/4AAQSkZJRg....VNpSP8f6VmE4oopks//Z

It is giving me an error when I try to decode the []byte of the image. 

panic: invalid JPEG format: missing SOI marker

items.body_markdown:
I am new to using R. Since my results appear somehow different than expected, I would highly appreciate your support.

1) Is there any restriction on the length of the path variable? I.e. could it happen that very long entries (=customer journeys) are automatically cutted at some point without notice? (Wondering whether that could be the reason for initial/mid funnel channels obtaining strong last/ even tough attribution values.)

2) With regard to the removal effect: I have the feeling that channels that have been strongly employed obtain high attribution values (despite not necessarily being more effective or efficient but just having been used a lot more often). Has anyone observed similar patterns? I wonder whether that observation would remain with machine learning approaches?

3) Knowing it is not the way it's supposed to be used: Could the package be used as a "starting point" with converted journeys ONLY when the full dataset (including converted AND non-converted journeys) is difficult to build/ needs time but you would still like to start moving rule-based to data-driven attribution? Or are results strongly biased?

Thank you so much!
Elisabeth
items.title: Channel attribution package: Interpretation & Restrictions?
items.body:
I am new to using R. Since my results appear somehow different than expected, I would highly appreciate your support.

1) Is there any restriction on the length of the path variable? I.e. could it happen that very long entries (=customer journeys) are automatically cutted at some point without notice? (Wondering whether that could be the reason for initial/mid funnel channels obtaining strong last/ even tough attribution values.)

2) With regard to the removal effect: I have the feeling that channels that have been strongly employed obtain high attribution values (despite not necessarily being more effective or efficient but just having been used a lot more often). Has anyone observed similar patterns? I wonder whether that observation would remain with machine learning approaches?

3) Knowing it is not the way it's supposed to be used: Could the package be used as a "starting point" with converted journeys ONLY when the full dataset (including converted AND non-converted journeys) is difficult to build/ needs time but you would still like to start moving rule-based to data-driven attribution? Or are results strongly biased?

Thank you so much! Elisabeth

items.title: why won't my simple turning argument that won't respond for some reason? (2D)
items.body:
I have a 2d sprite that I'm just trying to get to flip on its x axis on the press of a button. For some reason it just isn't responding to me even though all the other arguments are. I'm not receiving any error messages. Does anyone have a solution? It's driving me crazy because I've done this a bazillion times with enemies and now all of a sudden nothing is happening. The arguments are in the Flip and Flipper functions but I left the rest in there jic you see another argument that may be preventing the flip from happening.

using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine;

public class dragoonDetection : MonoBehaviour {

private Rigidbody2D rb;
private Animator anim;
[HideInInspector]
public bool flight;
[HideInInspector]
public regDragon detector;
public float flightHeight;
public float flightDistance;
private bool facingRight = true;
private bool state1;
public float changeTimer = 0f;
public float changeDelay = 0.5f;
public float attackTimer = 0;
public float attackDelay = 1f;
public float speed = 1f;
public Transform Player; 


void Start ()
{
    rb = GetComponent<Rigidbody2D> ();
    anim = GetComponent<Animator> ();
}

void Update()

{
    Detected ();
    ChangeTimes (); 
    StateChanger ();  
    Flip ();
}


void Flipper()
{
        facingRight = !facingRight;
        Vector3 theScale = transform.localScale;
        theScale.x *= -1;
        transform.localScale = theScale;
}

void Flip()
{

    if (facingRight && Input.GetKeyDown (KeyCode.LeftArrow)) {
        Flipper ();
        Debug.Log ("left");
    }

    if (!facingRight && Input.GetKeyDown (KeyCode.RightArrow)) {
        Flipper ();
        Debug.Log ("right");
    }

}

void Detected()
{
    if (detector == null) {
        return;
    } else 

    {
        if (detector.detected) {
            flight = true;
            anim.SetTrigger ("flight");
            rb.velocity = new Vector2 (rb.velocity.x, flightHeight);
            changeDelay -= Time.deltaTime;
        }
    }
}

void ChangeTimes ()
{
    if (changeDelay <= 0 && flight) {
        state1 = true;
    }
}

void StateChanger ()
{
    if (state1) {

        flightHeight = 0f;
    }
}

void OnTriggerEnter2D (Collider2D other)
{
    if (other.gameObject.tag == ("arrow")) {
        flight = true;
        anim.SetTrigger ("flight");
    }
}
}

items.title: React-Bootstrap Tooltip Show-Hide
items.body:
I am adding a react-bootstrap OverlayTrigger/Tooltip to a component that has another element that shows up when the mouse is hovered. Previously I had the other element show-hide based on the state, like so:

<div onMouseOver={this.showOverlay.bind(this)}
 onMouseOut={this.hideOverlay.bind(this)}
 <img src={imageUrl} />
 <div className={"my-class " + (this.state.showOverlay ? "" : "hide") />
</div>

Where showOverlay and hideOverlay were component functions:

showOverlay() => {
     this.setState({"showOverlay":true})
}
// ...

Now I wanted to add the OverlayTrigger / Tooltip components

<OverlayTrigger placement="bottom" overlay={<Tooltip id="123" >Whatever</Tooltip>}>
    <div onMouseOver={this.showOverlay.bind(this)}
     onMouseOut={this.hideOverlay.bind(this)}
     <img src={imageUrl} />
     <div className={"my-class " + (this.state.showOverlay ? "" : "hide") />
    </div>
</OverlayTrigger>

The onMouseOver function in the <div> seems to create some sort of conflict, as the overlay is not displayed.

I tried adding the show prop to the OverlayTrigger but it causes the tooltip to flicker, and the onMouseOver onMouseOut functions from OverlayTrigger to be executed dozens of times 

<OverlayTrigger show={this.state.showOverlay} />

And the same result moving onMouseOver, onMouseOut functions to the OverlayTrigger props:

<OverlayTrigger onMouseOver={this.showOverlay.bind(this)} />

items.title: Margin being added when using max-width
items.body:
I have a Vue component that I am adding in my index.html that has a max width of 600px. Somewhere along the way margin is being added which is causing the component to shrink before the 600px breakpoint as so:

I can't find where or why this is occurring. below is the code used as well as a fiddler which doesn't replicate the problem.

index.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>vue-counter</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="purely-testing-div-id">
      <income-tax></income-tax>
    </div>
    <script src="/dist/build.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

IncomeTax.vue

<template>
  <div class="calculator-parent">
    <div class="header">
      <h1 class="title">Income Tax</h1>
      <div class="button-group">
        <button class="icon"></button>
        <button class="icon"></button>
        <button class="icon"></button>
        <button class="icon"></button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        count: 0
      };
    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="scss">
  .calculator-parent {
    @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat');
    font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    background: aqua;
    max-width: 600px;

    .header {
      display: flex;
      flex: 1;
      align-items: center;

      .button-group {
        flex: 1;
        .icon {
          flex: 1;
          width: 32px;
          height: 32px;
        }
      }
      .title {
        flex: 1;
      }
    }
  }

</style>

Fiddler which has desired behaviour:

http://jsfiddle.net/filipelinhares/2eAqE/

items.title: How to create multiple subsets of DataFrame with loop
items.body:
Base DataFrame

df = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randint(0,10,size=(100,6)),columns = 
['red','blue','yellow','green','purple','total'])

How do I code this with a loop?

df_x = df[df.columns[[y,5]]]

I'd like to apply this logic to a dataframe with many more columns, but for simplicity sake, boiled down the question into this.

Below is desired output, 5 new dataframes created (Assuming I don't have to type all the 5 lines)

df_red = df[df.columns[[0,5]]]
df_blue = df[df.columns[[1,5]]]
df_yellow = df[df.columns[[2,5]]]
df_green = df[df.columns[[3,5]]]
df_purple = df[df.columns[[4,5]]]

items.body_markdown:
If I have an image that was edited/generated using JavaScript on the client (for example, a cropped photo or the result of a canvas drawing), is there a way to upload it using ActiveStorage?

It would typically be a large string containing `"<img src='data:image/jpeg;base64,...=='>"` that is stored in a JavaScript variable, not a file.
items.title: ActiveStorage to upload large base64 encoded string?
items.body:
If I have an image that was edited/generated using JavaScript on the client (for example, a cropped photo or the result of a canvas drawing), is there a way to upload it using ActiveStorage?

It would typically be a large string containing "<img src='data:image/jpeg;base64,...=='>" that is stored in a JavaScript variable, not a file.

items.body_markdown:
I am trying to use scipy.integrate.quad with Tensorflow as following.
`time` and `Lambda` are two Tensors with shape (None, 1).

    def f_t(self, time, Lambda):
        h = Lambda * self.shape * time ** (self.shape - 1)
        S = tf.exp(-1 * Lambda * time ** self.shape)
        return h * S


    def left_censoring(self, time, Lambda):
        return tf.map_fn(lambda x: integrate.quad(self.f_t,
                                                  0.0,
                                                  x[0], # it is not a float before evaluation
                                                  args=(x[1],)),
                         tf.concat([time, Lambda], 1))
However, I get an error as below:

    File "J:\Workspace\Distributions.py", line 30, in <lambda>
        args=(x[1],)),
      File "I:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\lib\site-packages\scipy\integrate\quadpack.py", line 323, in quad
        points)
      File "I:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\lib\site-packages\scipy\integrate\quadpack.py", line 388, in _quad
        return _quadpack._qagse(func,a,b,args,full_output,epsabs,epsrel,limit)
    TypeError: a float is required

X[0] is a Tensor with shape=(). It is not a float value before evaluation. Is it possible to solve the problem? How should I calculate integration in Tensorflow?
items.title: Use scipy.integrate.quad with Tensorflow
items.body:
I am trying to use scipy.integrate.quad with Tensorflow as following. time and Lambda are two Tensors with shape (None, 1).

def f_t(self, time, Lambda):
    h = Lambda * self.shape * time ** (self.shape - 1)
    S = tf.exp(-1 * Lambda * time ** self.shape)
    return h * S


def left_censoring(self, time, Lambda):
    return tf.map_fn(lambda x: integrate.quad(self.f_t,
                                              0.0,
                                              x[0], # it is not a float before evaluation
                                              args=(x[1],)),
                     tf.concat([time, Lambda], 1))

However, I get an error as below:

File "J:\Workspace\Distributions.py", line 30, in <lambda>
    args=(x[1],)),
  File "I:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\lib\site-packages\scipy\integrate\quadpack.py", line 323, in quad
    points)
  File "I:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\lib\site-packages\scipy\integrate\quadpack.py", line 388, in _quad
    return _quadpack._qagse(func,a,b,args,full_output,epsabs,epsrel,limit)
TypeError: a float is required

X[0] is a Tensor with shape=(). It is not a float value before evaluation. Is it possible to solve the problem? How should I calculate integration in Tensorflow?

items.title: PowerShell JWT PrivateKey x509Certificates
items.body:
I am working on a project to create a JWT connector with Box that multiple teams can use for their own applications.

I am running into an issue with the Private Key and when creating the signature. I don't have a clear understanding of Certifications and what to do here. Could someone explain what I am doing wrong and what I need to do?

Here is the code I am writing:

class BoxJWT
{
    [string]$url;
    [string]$clientID;
    [string]$clientSecret;
    [string]$enterpriseID;    
    [string]$publicKeyID;    
    [string]$privateKeyID;
    [string]$passphrase;

    <# ========&&==========&&==========&&==========&&======== #>
    <# ========&&========= Connect to Box =========&&======== #>
    <# ========&&==========&&==========&&==========&&======== #>
    [object]BoxConnect()
    {
        #Get the bytes of the PrivateKey
        $prik = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetBytes($this.privateKeyID)
        $exp = [int][double]::parse((Get-Date -Date $((Get-Date).AddSeconds(60).ToUniversalTime()) -UFormat %s)) 

        #Create the header
        $headers = @{
           "alg" = "RS256"; 
           "typ" = "JWT"; 
        } | ConvertTo-Json -Compress

        #Create the claim
        $claim = @{
           "iss" = $this.clientID;
           "sub" = $this.enterpriseID; 
           "box_sub_type" = "enterprise";
           "aud" = 'https://api.box.com/oauth2/token';
           "exp" = $exp;
           "jti" = (1..20 | %{ '{0:X}' -f (Get-Random -Max 128) }) -join ''
        } | ConvertTo-Json -Compress

        $headers_base64 = [System.Convert]::ToBase64String([System.Text.Encoding]::ASCII.GetBytes($headers)).Split('=')[0].Replace('+', '-').Replace('/', '_') 
        $claim_base64 = [System.Convert]::ToBase64String([System.Text.Encoding]::ASCII.GetBytes($claim)).Split('=')[0].Replace('+', '-').Replace('/', '_') 

       #Prepare the signature.
       $pre_signature = ($headers_base64 + "." + $claim_base64)

       $encyption = New-Object -TypeName System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2
       $encyption.Import($prik)

       #$JWTAssertion = "$headers_base64.$claim_base64.$signature" 

       #$body = 'grant_type=urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer&client_id=' + $this.clientID + '&client_secret=' + $this.clientSecret + '&assertion='+ $JWTAssertion
       #Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $this.url -Body $body -Method Post -ContentType "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"

       return '';
 }
}

$file = "$env:userprofile\Desktop\box_config.json"
$cont = Get-Content $file | ConvertFrom-Json
$v = New-Object -TypeName BoxJWT
$v.url = "https://api.box.com/oauth2/token";
$v.clientID = $cont.boxAppSettings.clientID
$v.clientSecret = $cont.boxAppSettings.clientSecret
$v.enterpriseID = $cont.enterpriseID
$v.passphrase = $cont.boxAppSettings.appAuth.passphrase
$v.privateKeyID = $cont.boxAppSettings.appAuth.privateKey
$v.publicKeyID = $cont.boxAppSettings.appAuth.publicKeyID

$v.BoxConnect()

Error:

Exception calling "Import" with "1" argument(s): "Cannot find the requested 
object.
"
At C:\Users\username\Box\username\object-jwt.ps1:44 char:9
+         $encyption.Import($prik)
+         ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   
    + CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [], MethodInvocationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CryptographicException

Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

items.title: How use google places api to display photos of a venue,
items.body:
var str = "";

$.ajax({
  dataType: 'json',
  type: 'GET',
  url: 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/nearbysearch/json?location=40.720032,-73.988354&radius=10000&type=bars&keyword=bar&key=KEY-HERE,
  success: function(data){

for(var dt in data.results){
  $('ul').append('<li>'+data.results[dt].name+'</li>');

  $.ajax({
    dataType: 'json',
    type: 'GET',
    url: 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/details/json?placeid='+data.results[dt].place_id+'&key=KEY-HERE',
    success: function(data1){
      for(var i = 0; i < data1.result.reviews.length; i++){
        if(data1.result.reviews){
          str = data1.result.reviews[i].rating;

          $('ul').append('<span>'+str+'</span><li>'+data1.result.reviews[i].author_name+'</li>');
          }
        }

  $.ajax({
    dataType: 'json',
    type: 'GET',
    url: 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/streetview?size=600x300&location=40.7484,-73.9857&heading=151.78&pitch=-0.76&key=KEY-HERE',
    success: function(data2){
      var attributions = $("#attributions");
      var service = new google.maps.places.PlacesService(attributions);
      service.getDetails(data1.results[0].place_id, function(place, status) {
          if (status === google.maps.places.PlacesServiceStatus.OK) {

            var src = 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/streetview?size=600x300&location=40.7484,-73.9857&heading=151.78&pitch=-0.76&key=KEY-HERE';
             return $("#image").attr('src', sr);
    }
  })
}

})

its responding with a 200 status code in my console but not showing the images in my browser, its also giving me one photo for the location yet its supposed to respond with different photos for the venue

items.title: Loading data in Powerpoint array with VBA
items.body:
I am trying to load data in Powerpoint VBA array from Excel. This data will be used later to perform find/replace in powerpoint. I get stuck at the last line of the code below. I accepted this code to load the array for future operations:

Dim FindList As Variant '<- this is array to be loaded with data
Dim xlApp As Object
Dim xlBook As Object

Set xlApp = CreateObject("Excel.Application")
Set xlBook = xlApp.Workbooks.Open("C:\Users\Boxync\findreplace.xlsx")
Set FindList = xlBook.Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("A1:A4").Value

items.body_markdown:
My website loads at the bottom of the page on mobile devices and I'm unsure as to why.
If anyone can help that would be great. 
Site is https://www.thesurebettor.com/
